hint: Apply selective dimension table filtering early using CTEs or derived tables, while maintaining the original join structure and OR logic.
Isolate key dimension filters (date, demographics) into explicit CTEs, then rewrite implicit comma joins as explicit ANSI joins for better predicate pushdown.
Materialize all pre-filtered dimension and fact tables into separate CTEs with aggressive predicate application before final joins.
Transform the complex OR conditions into UNION ALL subqueries to enable separate optimization paths, then apply self-join elimination and materialization.
